ProtoboX

email me.

The sitch

I will build a web prototype of your idea in one month for $2000. At the end you get a fully functional website, keys to the code repository and a chance to validate your idea.

What you give

  • A description of your requirements/idea
  • A packet of wireframes/designs

What you get

  • A working implementation of your idea
  • A prototype written in either JavaScript or Clojure

The developer

My name is Ziyad Parekh and I enjoy building things. I've always had a fascination with software and have worked on several interesting projects including Voice and 1stdibs. Throughtout the process of programming every day and being mentored by some really smart people, I've learnt the arts of writing good software and this is my chance of sharing that experience with you. So get in touch if you're interested or if you just want to connect.
